description:
This app is ideal for anyone working it sales or anyone who owns their own business.  The Margin and Markup Calculator calculates sales figures in an instant. It  helps you make quick decisions when you don't have time to enter a formula.  Just enter two values and the Margin and Markup Calculator will instantly populate the rest.  Sale, Cost, Profit, Margin, Markup – enter any 2 and the remaining values are calculated for you.

The Margin and Markup Calculator has 3 input options:

1. Amounts – select this option if you know 2 of either the cost price, selling price or profit and remaining values will be calculated.

2. Margin – select this option if you know the margin % you want and either the cost price or selling price and the remaining values will be calculated

3. Markup - select this option if you know the markup % you want and either the cost price or selling price and the remaining values will be calculated
